key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on international manufacturers and single sourcing strategy
Profitability challenges from high operating costs and retail expansion
Regulatory and legal risks from compliance with vision care and healthcare laws
Data privacy and cybersecurity concerns with virtual try-on and telehealth services
controversies: Criticism of sustainability efforts as not comprehensive enough, particularly regarding the environmental impact of the global supply chain
environmental_issues: Environmental impact of global supply chain and sourcing practices
social_issues: Addressing global access to eyewear through 'Buy a Pair, Give a Pair' program
governance_issues: Ensuring compliance with extensive state, local, and federal regulations
